Gabriel ThamLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 15 Sep 2018You can still buy it from SGX because it is listed. However, you have to factor in the current price vs the bond coupon. You may not get the same yield % as someone who bought at IPO if the current price is high.​​0 comments0
